leads.lead_text: Inflorescences arising from more than 4 nodes, with upper inflorescences not or hardly exceeding whorls and 2- or 3-flowered
Inflorescences arising from 1–4 nodes, with all inflorescences exceeding whorls and upper inflorescences mostly 4 or more flowered
